item.title: Senior Hamas official: Terror group can’t commit to disarm, is open to 3-5 year truce - The Times of Israel
item.description:
1. Senior Hamas official: Terror group can’t commit to disarm, is open to 3-5 year truce  The Times of Israel
  2. Exclusive: Hamas aims to keep grip on Gaza security and can't commit to disarm, senior official says  Reuters
  3. Hamas defends public executions of Palestinians, threatens fragile peace deal by refusing to lay down arms  nypost.com
  4. Hamas will not commit to disarm until further negotiations, official says  Middle East Eye
  5. Is Hamas ready to hand over control of Gaza after war? Group reacts ahead of Sharm El-Sheikh Peace Summit in Egypt  Mint
